Daniel Ntesa Zitani, nke a na-akpọkarị Ntesa Dalienst bụ onye na-edekọ egwu n'Afrịka, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eti egwu, na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
Ọ bụbu onye otu soukous band TPOK Jazz, nke François Luambo Makiadi duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu egwu Congo site n'afọ 1950s ruo 1980s.
